ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would absolutely recommend this course to another person. I would summarize it as a course that meets twice weekly, once for a lecture on a topic and once for a discussion based on questions from the students and instructor. Although the topics are all unrelated, the breadth of information covered is excellent and there is a lot of thought provoking discussion that occurs.
Yes, an excellent class, sometimes difficult if you are not familiar with the topic (depending on the prof).
Useful and important class to take. Yes I would recommend it.
It was an excellent course. I would definitely recommend it to others.
Yes, I will. You can learn a lot of recent controversial issues beyond fundamental discoveries in this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course has high relevanve to my research, and it helps me a lot in organizing my ideas and come up with some new ideas.
This course is excellent in that it challenges students to ask/answer questions for which there are not yet answers. This course aided me in thinking about my research project, giving me new ideas.
Gave me a much better understanding of various topics in Immunology, which are very relevant since I am in the Immunology track.
